name: Dungeon Dweller (Brash Digital)
description:
2d Roguelike Dungeon Crawler made as a result of a Fantastic Udemy Course by James Doyle. 

3 Procedurally Generated Dungeons to explore and an Epic Boss Battle to finish the game. Explore and find the Gun Room, The Shop and the Character Unlock Room. 

But don't stop there as you can Unlock 20 additional characters to explore the Dungeon with.

Known Bugs - The 2nd Dungeon sometimes fails to Load properly, I have applied a fix but please let me know if you experience this
